EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-12-02-AWS re:Invent US.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Pleased to make your acquaintance at AWS re:Invent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, It was great meeting you at AWS re:Invent, we hope you enjoyed the show and are honored you took time to stop by the Turbonomic booth.
Wherever you are in your journey to the cloud, even if it’s just a thought in your mind, Turbonomic is here to help. Our autonomic IT platform assures performance for workloads whether you’re on-prem, fully in AWS, or leveraging hybrid, all the while being as cost-effective as possible.
We are pleased to offer you Turbonomic AWS Cloud Manager <[[https://turbonomic.com/aws-cloud-manager?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=aws-reinvent-2016-us&utm_content=12-12-2016]]>. Free for 6-months, just spin-up the AMI and get ready to see value within minutes (can you say “Self-managing EC2 instances?”).
Even if you haven’t made the leap to AWS yet, you can still experience the benefits of autonomic performance with our free 30-day trial for virtual environments <[[https://turbonomic.com/downloads/turbonomic-30-day-trial?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=aws-reinvent-2016-us&utm_content=12-12-2016]]>. Give it a try!
The Turbonomic Team
